Text: (Note: The previously unseen parts of this episode are shown inbluetext.)
[Scene: Central Perk, Chandler, Joey, Phoebe, and Monica are there.]
(They all stare, bemused.)
[Time Lapse]
[Time Lapse, Ross has entered.]
(Ross gestures his consent.)
(Rachel enters in a wet wedding dress and starts to search the room.)
(They go to hug but Ross's umbrella opens. He sits back down defeated again. A moment of silence follows as Rachel sits and the others expect her to explain.)
(The scene on TV has changed to show two women, one is holding her hair.)
(She is pushed down the stairs and everyone cheers.)
[Time Lapse, Rachel is breating into a paper bag.]
(The door buzzer sounds and Chandler gets it.)
(There's a knock on the door and it's Paul.)
(Monica goes to change.)
[Scene: The Subway, Phoebe is singing for change.]
[Scene: Ross's Apartment, the guys are there assembling furniture.]
(Joey and Chandler are finishing assembling the bookcase.)
(Joey checks that Ross is not looking and dumps it in a plant.)
[Scene: A Restaurant, Monica and Paul are eating.]
[Scene: Ross's Apartment; Ross is pacing while Joey and Chandler are working on some more furniture.]
[Scene: Monica's Apartment, Rachel is watching Joanne Loves Chaci.]
[Scene: Ross's Apartment, they're all sitting around and talking.]
[Cut to Rachel staring out of her window.]
[Scene: Monica's Apartment, Rachel is making coffee for Joey and Chandler.]
(Monica and Paul walk to the door and talk in a low voice so the others can't hear. The others move Monica's table closer to the door so that they can.)
(Monica exits.)
[Scene: Iridium, Monica is working as Frannie enters.]
[Scene: Central Perk, everyone but Rachel is there.]
(Monica pushes him off of the sofa as Rachel enters with a shopping bag.)

(She finishes cutting them up and they all cheer.)

[Scene: Central Perk, everyone is there.]
[Scene Central Perk, everyone's there.]

[Scene: Museum of Prehistoric History, Ross and a co-worker
(Marsha) are setting up an exhibit which includes some mannequins of cave people.]
(Carol, Ross's ex-wife, has entered behind them and is standing outstide the exhibit.)
(Marsha extis and Ross waves Carol into the exhibit.)

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Chandler, Joey, Phoebe, and Monica are watching Three's
Company.]
(Monica starts to fluff a pillow.)
(Rachel enters from her room.)

(Chandler, Joey, and Phoebe start to pick through the lasagne as there's a knock on the
door which Monica answers.)
(Joey starts to eat the rest of the lasagne and everyone turns and stares at him.)

[Scene, Monica and Rachel's, Monica and Ross are pouring wine for their
parents.]
[Time Lapse, everyone is now eating.]
[Time Lapse.]
[Time Lapse.]
(Stunned silence ensues.)
[Scene: Central Park, everyone's there.]

(Joey turns off the lights, and they all leave as Rachel starts to clean up.  Ross
enters from the bathroom.)
[Scene: Carol's OB/GYN, Carol is waiting.]
(Susan enters holding a drink.)
[Scene Barry's office, Barry is working on patient, Robbie, as Rachel enters.]
(As Barry exits Robbie stares at Rachel.)
[Scene: Carol's OB/GYN, they're talking about how this is going to work.]

[Scene: Barry's office, Rachel is doing her makeup in the mirror on Barry's lamp as
Barry enters.]
(Barry and Rachel look at each other.)
[Scene: Carol's OB/GYN, they're still arguing about what to name the baby.]

(He turns to go, but the sound of the sonogram catches hes ear.  He returns and
stares at it.)

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's apartment, everyone is watching the tape of the sonogram.
  Rachel is on the phone.]
[Scene: Central Perk, everyone but Phoebe is there.]
[Scene: Chandler and Joey's, Chandler is helping Joey rehearse for a part.]

(Joey takes out a pack of cigarettes and a lighter.  He fumbles and drops the
lighter.  Then he lights a cigarett, takes a drag, and coughs.)
(Joey lets his wrist go limp.)
(Joey tries and visibly winces.)
(Joey reluctantly gives him the cigarette.)
[Scene, Central Perk, everyone except Phoebe and Rachel is there.]
(The guys stretch out their fingers.)

(The gang swaps all the drinks for what they ordered as Phoebe enters.  She sits
down without saying hi.)
(Chandler leans over the back of the couch out of sight.)

(Chandler tries to shrug nonchalantly but eventually he has to exhale a mouthful of
smoke.)
[Scene: Iridium, Monica and Paula are at work.]
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Chandler is smoking out on the balcony, Phoebe is absent.]

(Chandler makes a 'Cross my heart' sign.  It starts to rain and he taps on the
window.)
(Chandler sulkilty picks up a garbage can lid and uses it as an umbrella.)

(Phoebe enters, walks to the couch, sits down, and begins to read a letter without
saying hi.)
(The intercom buzzes.)
(Chandler comes in, dripping wet.)
(She opens the door and Alan enters.)
(Everyone laughs.)
[Time lapse, Alan is leaving.]
(Silence.)
(Dubious pause.)

[Scene: Central Perk, Monica is alone as Ross, Rachel, Chandler, and Joey enter
dejectedly in softball gear.]
[Scene: A street, Phoebe walks up to a homeless person (Lizzie) she knows.]

[Scene: Chandler's office, Chandler looks around, opens his desk drawer, takes a puff
of a cigarette, sprays around some air freshener, and takes some breath spray.  He
types for a little while, opens the drawer again, and takes another drag of the cigarette.
  While not paying attention, he sprays the breath spray around the room, takes a
squirt of air freshener and gags.]
[Scene: A Street, Phoebe and Lizzie are at a hot dog vendor.]
(Phoebe opens the can and reacts.)
[Scene: Central Perk, Phoebe is telling everyone about her discovery.]
(Phoebe nods.)
(Chandler lights a cigarette.)
(An awkward silence ensues.)
(Phoebe spits out her hair.)
(Monica laughs and snorts.)
(They degenerate into bickering and Chandler happily starts to smoke, undisturbed.)
[Scene: Iridium, Monica and Paula are working.]
[Scene: Cental Perk, Joey and Ross are persecuting Chandler about his smoking.]
(They give each other a dubious look.)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, everyond except Monica and Joey is watching Lambchop.]
(They all gasp and clutch each other.)
[Scene: A Restaurant, Monica is breaking the news to Alan.]
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, everyone is mopping around and eating ice cream.]
[Scene: Central Perk, everyone is there except Joey.]

[Scene: Central Perk, Ross and Monica are watching Phoebe
sleep.]

(Chandler and Joey enter.  Joey is counting his
steps.)
(Rachel runs up cluching an envelope.)
(They all get their wallets out and give generous tips.)

[Scene: A Street, Chandler and Joey are kicking a can to
each other.]

(They walk on.  Chandler and Joey start to talk but
Ross stops and whines.)

[Scene: Central Perk, Rachel, Lesile, Kiki, and Joanne are
talking.]

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe and Monica are in
pajamas and Monica is making something in the blender as Rachel enters.]

[Scene: Madison Square Garden, the guys are trying
to find their seats.]

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, they're all hanging out in the
living room.]

[Scene: Madison Square Garden, the guys are
watching the game.]

(The player shoots and the puck flies off the rink and hits
Ross in the face.  Chandler looks concered until he notices...)
(Chandler and Joey hold the puck and wave at the TV thing.)

[Scene: An Emergency Room, Chandler and Joey are leading
Ross in.]
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, the slumber party continues.]

[Scene: The Emergency Room, Joey is miming hockey pucks
kitting foreheads.  Chandler realises it's getting tense and goes to the receptionist
again.]

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, the girls are all out on the
balcony.]

[Scene: The Emergency Room, Ross is still going on about
his first night with Carol.]

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, the girls are still out on the
balcony.]
[Scene: The Emergency Room, Ross is absent.]

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Joey and the girls are playing
twister.]

(There's a knock on the door, Chandler opens it, and
silently hands back the cushion.)
(The phone rings and Chandler answers it.)
[Scene: Central Perk, all six are there.]
(Long pause.)
[Scene: Central Perk, all are there.]
(Angela, a beautiful woman in a tight dress, enters.)
(Angela takes a seat at the counter.)
(Cut to Ross and Rachel, talking next to one of the tables.)
(Cut back to Joey and Angela at the counter.)

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's apartment, Joey is there, trying to convince Monica to pose
as his girlfriend. His plan is to hook Monica up with Angela's boyfriend Bob and then take
Angela back for himself.]
[Scene: Ross' apartment, Chandler is over.]

[Scene: A fancy restaurant, Joey and Monica are there, meeting Angela and Bob, who
Monica thinks is Angela's brother.]
(Angela and Bob walk in. Bob is good-looking.)

[Scene: Central Perk, Chandler and Phoebe are there, both ready to break up with their
significant others.]
(Janice and Phoebe's boyfriend, Tony, walk in.)

(Chandler sees Phoebe breaking up with Tony. She talks to him for a few seconds, hugs
him, and then he leaves. Chandler is amazed how easy it was for her.)
(The drinks arrive, and Chandler downs his espresso in one gulp.)

(Chandler walks over to the counter where Phoebe is, and is asking her about the
break-up.)

[Scene: The Launderama, Rachel is there, waiting for Ross. An old woman takes Rachel's
clothes off the machine and begins loading it with her things.]
(Ross arrives.)

(The woman and Ross stare at each other. Finally she takes her stuff out of the machine
and leaves.)
(Ross pulls out a huge box of laundry detergent.)
(Rachel starts to load her clothes.)
[Scene: Fancy restaurant, Monica, Joey, Angela, and Bob are seated at the table.]
[Scene: Fancy restaurant, Joey and Bob are talking.]
[Scene: The ladies' bathroom at the restaurant, Monica and Angela are talking.]
[Scene: Central Perk, Phoebe is coaching Chandler on how to break up with Janice.]
(Chandler walks back to couch, where Janice is.)
[Scene: The laundromat.]
(The woman who had tried to steal the washing machine walks by, and laughs.)

[Scene: The fancy restaurant, Angela has her hand in Bob's shirt, and Monica is very
uncomfortable.]
(Her and Joey walk away from the table.)

[Time lapse, Monica accidentally spilled her drink on Bob's shirt and is wiping it off.
Joey is making eyes at Angela.]

(Angela is eating chicken wings and making the weasel-like noise Joey had told Bob
about.)

[Scene: Central Perk, Chandler is still trying to ease things over with Janice, and
there are about a dozen empty Espresso cups in front of him. He is extremely wired.]
(She leaves.)
(Janice returns from the bathroom.)

(Phoebe goes over to speak to Janice. She talks to her for a few seconds, and then
Janice immediately smiles, hugs her, waves to Chandler, and leaves.)
[Scene: The Launderama. Rachel is sorting her now-pink clothes.]
(The same woman walks over and takes Rachel's laundry cart.)
(Rachel looks at Ross, who motions to her to get the cart back.)
(They struggle for the cart. Finally, Rachel climbs inside of it.)
(She thinks it over, and then walks away.)
(Rachel stands up and kisses Ross. He is stunned. A moment of silence follows.)

[Scene: Central Perk, Ross, Rachel, and Phoebe are there. Ross has an icepack to his
head.]
(Monica and Joey enter.)
(Chandler runs by the window outside, joyous.)

[Scene: A Theater, the gang is in the audience wating for a play of Joey's to
start.]
(The lights dim.)
(The lights go up on the stage, Joey, as Freud, is talking to a female patient.)

[Scene: The Theater, the play has ended and everyone is applauding.  As soon as
the cast leaves, the gang all groan and sit down heavily.]
(Joey enters from behind a curtain.  The others all talk at once.)
(Pause)
[Scene: Central Perk, everyone else is there as Chandler enters.]

(A flashback of Aurora and Chandler on their date in Central Perk is denoted by
italics.)
(They all pretend to fall asleep.)
(They all fall asleep again.)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Rachel is there as enter except Joey enter.]
(Monica gasps.)
(Joey enters and he's on the phone.)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, the next morning, Monica is getting the door.]
(Joey enters with Monica's paper and hands it to her.)
(Chandler enters with the phone.)
(Rachel enters from her room.)
(She opens the door and he leaves.)
[Scene: A Film Set, Joey is entering for his scene.]
(Joey starts to the shower with a grim, determined look on his face.)
[Scene: Chandler and Joey's, Aurora and Chandler are in bed in Chandler's room.]
(She kisses him, he holds her, and kisses her passionately.)
(She leaves, Chandler sighs, and falls back on his bed.)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Ross is trying to comfort Chandler.  Joey is absent.]
(Joey enters.)
(Ross and Chandler look at each other and hug as well.)
[Scene: Monica's Bedroom, she's lying in bed wide awake.]

[Scene: Central Perk, Rachel is introducing Phoebe, who is playing her guitar for the
crowd.]
(applause)

[Scene: The ATM vestibule of a bank, Chandler is inside. The lights go out, and he
realizes he is trapped inside.]

(Chandler sees that there is a gorgeous model inside the vestibule with him. He makes a
gesture of quiet exuberance.)

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Monica is on the phone with her mother. Phoebe, Rachel,
and Ross are there.]
(Monica and Rachel look at Phoebe strangely.)

[Scene: ATM vestibule, Jill Goodacre is on the cellular phone. Chandler's thoughts are
in italics.]
(Chandler strides proudly across the vestibule and Jill stares at him.)
[Scene: Monica's apartment, Joey enters with a menorah, the candles lit.]
(They all look at the window, grossed out, then flinch in pain.)
[Scene: ATM vestibule.]
(Chandler smiles at her, she smiles back sweetly.)
(He continues to smile like an idiot, and she looks frightened.)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, The phone rings; it's Chandler.]

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, time has passed. The five are sitting around the coffee
table talking.]

[Time lapse, Ross and Rachel are talking, Joey is on the couch, and Monica and Phoebe
are out of the room.]
(Ross gets up, pleased with himself.)
[Scene: ATM vestibule.]
[Scene: Monica's apartment, Phoebe is singing.]
(Monica walks in, starts to go out on the balcony.)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's Balcony, Ross and Rachel are talking.]

[Cut to inside. Monica, Joey and Phoebe are singing while outside, Ross and Rachel are
trying to get the cat off of Ross' shoulder.]

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Phoebe is holding the cat, Monica is treating the
scratches on Ross' back. Joey is holding the menorah over the wound.]
(Ross flinches in pain.)
[Scene: ATM vestibule.]

[Scene: The hallway of Monica's building. Phoebe and Rachel are trying to find the
cat's owner.]
[Scene: Rachel has gone off on her own to look for the cat's owner.]

(While looking at the floor for the cat, Rachel runs into a pair of legs. She slowly
gets up and sees a gorgeous Italian hunk holding the cat. Who, by the way, you'll hate
very, very soon. The man. Not the cat.)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Ross, Monica, and Joey are playing Monopoly.]
(Phoebe enters.)
[Scene: ATM vestibule.]

(Chandler waits until Jill is looking, then starts to blow a bubble. But instead of
blow one, he accidentally spits the gum out of his mouth and hits the wall.)
(Chandler starts to choke.)

(Chandler tries to save face and makes the 'OK' sign with his hands, while obviously
unable to breathe.)

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Rachel and Paolo are at the window. Ross and Joey are
watching disgustedly.]
(Rachel walks away from Paolo, laughing.)
(Ross looks at Joey.)

[Cut to the other side of the apartment, Ross has gone over to straighten things out
with Paolo.]

(Ross notices that Paolo is standing on a step, which makes him taller. Ross gets up on
the same step so he can look down at Paolo.)
(They hug.)

[Scene: ATM vestibule, Chandler and Jill are sitting below the counter with two pens
dangling from their chains in front of them. Jill is showing Chandler how to swing the pen
around his head.]
(Chandler tries to do the same thing but the pen hits him in the head.)
(He swings the pen hard, and it snaps back and almost hits him again.)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, the gang is all sitting around the table.]
(Everyone starts to imitate him.)

(The lights come back on, and Rachel and Paolo are making out. Ross clutches his
chest.)
[Scene: ATM vestibule, the power has come back on.]

(She leaves. Chandler presses his face to the glass door after her, stroking the window
lovingly. He then turns to the security camera and starts talking to it.)

[Scene: Chandler's Office, Chandler is on a coffee break.  
Shelley enters.)
Shelley: Hey gorgeous, how's it going?
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, everyone is there.)
(Joey congratulates Ross, sees Chandler's look and abruptly stops.)
(Phone rings; Monica gets it)

[Scene: The Hospital, Mr. and Mrs. Geller are there, along with Aunt Lillian. Ross and
Monica enter and everyone says hi and kisses.)
(Monica strides over to Ross, who is making coffee, and talks to him aside.)
(They hug.)
[Cut to the hospital, later. Everyone is talking about Nana.]
(The nurse comes out of Nana's room.)
(Everyone stands up. Cut to Ross and Monica in Nana's room.)

(He goes to kiss her but she moves. Monica screams. Ross shouts and stares in
disbelief. Monica runs out of the room.)
(Ross runs out too.)
(Monica returns with the nurse and they go into Nana's room.)

(Nana passes for the second time and the nurse pulls the blanket over her. Ross and
Monica go to tell the family)
[Scene: Central Perk, Chandler, Phoebe, Joey, and Rachel are there.]
(Monica and Ross enter.)
[Scene: Nana's house, Ross, Mrs. Geller and Aunt Lillian are going through clothes.]
(They open a cupboard which, amongst other things, contains a chest of drawers)

(He tries pushing against the chest of drawers. Then he opens one of the drawers and
climbs into the closet using that; he falls behind the chest of drawers with a shout.)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Monica is talking to her father.]
[Scene: Chandler's Office, Shelley is drinking coffee; Chandler enters.]
[Scene: Nana's Bedroom, Ross is holding a dress out from inside the closet.]
(Ross falls back inside)

(He finds a shoebox (out of shot), pulls it down and opens it. It is full of Sweet
'n' Lo's.)

(He reaches up higher and knocks down another shoebox lid. Sweet 'n' Lo's rain
down on him)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Monica and Rachel are preparing to leave for the funeral.]
(They all leave.)
[Scene: The cemetary, after the funeral.]
(Joey listens to his overcoat for a second and sighs, then notices Chandler watching)
(Rachel steps in a patch of mud)

[Scene: The Wake, at the Gellers' house. Ross is lying on his back, with Phoebe
squatting over him, checking to see if he's injured.]
(Cut to Chandler and a woman, Andrea, reaching for the same slice of meat)

(They shake hands. Cut to Ross emerging from a hallway, grinning inanely. He is
obviously very stoned)

(Cut to Joey watching TV in the corner. He makes an extravagant gesture of
disappointment.)
(Time lapse. A large crowd of men are now watching the game)
(There is a cry of disappointment from the crowd of men.)
[Scene: Central Perk, the gang are looking at old photos.]
[Scene: Chandler's Office, Chandler is on a coffee break as Lowell enters.]
[Scene: Central Perk, Rachel is confronting her boss, Terry.]
[Scene: Central Perk, Rachel is approaching a customer.]
(Monica enters.)
(Joey enters. His face looks abnormally colorful.)
(Ross comes back to the couch.)
[Scene: Carol and Susan's apartment, Susan is there. Ross enters.]
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, everyone is there but Rachel.]
(Rachel enters.)
(Rachel opens it. Inside is the money she needed.)
[Scene: The subway, Joey spots a gorgeous woman waiting. He goes up to her.]

(Joey turns around and sees his face on a poster in the subway. The poster says: What
Mario isn't telling you...V.D., you never know who might have it. A variety of scenes are
shown with the poster displayed all over New York City.)
[Scene: Central Perk, Joey enters, amongst snickers from the gang.]
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Joey enters, upset.]

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Monica is cooking Thanksgiving dinner. Chandler is
standing in the doorway, not wanting to participate in the festivities.]
(Rachel enters, excited.)
(Phoebe takes a slice of pumpkin pie and waves it in front of Chandler's face.)
(Chandler leaves.)
(Ross grabs for some food, Monica slaps his hand away.)
(Ross exits.)
(Chandler enters, running.)
(Everyone leaves the apartment.)
[Scene: Carol and Susan's, Ross is preparing to talk to her belly.]
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, the group is coming back from the roof.]
(Joey leaves to get the copy of the key.)
[Scene: Carol and Susan's, Carol is reading, Ross is talking to her stomach.]
(Susan enters.)
[Scene: The Hallway, Joey has a tray full of keys, and is trying each one in the lock.]
(Short pause.)
(They walk in. Smoke fills the apartment.)
(Ross enters, singing.)
(all shouting)
[Time lapse. Everyone is upset with each other. Phoebe is at the window.]
(They all run to the window.)
[Time lapse. The gang is around the table, eating grilled cheese sandwiches.]

[Scene: The Subway, Joey sees his poster and he peels off the caption on his poster,
revealing more posters underneath. The captions read, as follows:
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Ross is entering.]
(A monkey jumps on to his shoulder.)
[Scene: Central Perk, Phoebe is getting ready to sing. Joey is not there.]
(Enter Joey)
(Cut to later. Everyone is totally depressed by now.)

(Over the sound of Phoebe singing we hear two scientists, Max and David, having a noisy
discussion)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, everyone except Joey is decorating for Christmas.]

[Joey enters, his shoes have bells on, which jingle as he walks. He is wearing a long
coat.]
(He removes the coat to reveal an elf costume)
(Marcel knocks over some kitchen tools)

[Scene: Max and David's lab, David is explaining something to Phoebe with the aid of a
whiteboard.]
(They kiss, finally)
[Scene: Central Perk, everyone is there.]
(Max runs in)
[Scene: Max and David's lab, they are working. Phoebe knocks on the door]
(He thinks for a moment and sweeps the stuff off the table)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, the party has started.]
(Someone knocks on the door; Monica gets it)
(Joey and Monica look at each other and shrug. Ross enters with Marcel on his shoulder)

(The door opens. Rachel is standing there. Her coat is muddy and torn, her hair is
dishevelled and her face is bruised. Everyone turns to look)
[Time lapse. Monica and Rachel, fixed up somewhat, emerge from a bedroom]
(They almost kiss and then Joey realises her kids are staring at them)
(Someone else knocks on the door. Monica looks through the spyhole)
(Everyone cheers. Monica opens the door. Bobby is obviously very depressed)
(Monica gestures wildly behind Fun Bobby's back)

[Time lapse. Bobby is talking about his grandfather. Everyone else is virtually in
tears]
(Ross is still taking photos)
(David is feeding Phoebe popcorn. Max walks up)
(Phoebe leads David into a bedroom)
(Joey puts a blanket over Sandy's kids)

(Bobby waves and then bursts into tears. Midnight comes and everyone at the party
except for the gang cheers and kisses)
[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, time lapse.]
[Scene: A Street: Monica and Phoebe are walking to a newsstand.]
(The guy walks past them)
(The guy walks on)
(The guy turns round, startled. Monica points to Phoebe. The guy gets hit by a truck)
[Scene: Hospital, the guy is in a coma and Mon and Pheebs are visiting.]

[Scene: Monica and Rachel's, Monica and Phoebe are telling everyone about their coma
guy.]
(Everyone has settled down to watch, except Chandler)
(Rachel opens the door to Paolo)
(The gang turn to look at Chandler)

[Scene: The Hospital, it's a montage of Monica and Phoebe's visit to the hospital with My
Guy playing in the background.  It starts with Monica reading a newspaper to
him.]

[Next is a shot of them dragging an enormous plant into the room, then Monica knitting
a sweater, then Phoebe singing, then Phoebe shaving him and chatting to Monica]
[Scene: A Mexican Restaurant, Monica, Phoebe, Joey, Chandler and his mom are there.]
(Enter Rachel and Paolo. They are both somewhat flustered)

[Time lapse. Ross is now clearly drunk. He is holding up a shot glass to his eye like a
jeweller's eye.]
(Rachel feeds something to Paolo. He eats it and licks her hand)
[Cut to Mrs. Bing on the telephone.]
(Ross emerges from a toilet marked 'Chicas')
(She kisses him on the cheek)
(...Then full on the mouth)
(Enter Joey)

[Scene: Chandler and Joey's, the next morning. Joey is getting the door in his dressing
gownit's Ross.]
(Ross drags Joey into the hall and slams the door)
(Chandler opens the door and startles them. He picks up the paper)
(Monica and Rachel's door opens and Rachel and Paolo emerge)
(She and Paolo walk a little way down the hall)
(They kiss. Ross is watching them)
(Joey and Ross go into Monica and Rachel's apartment)

[Scene: Hospital. Phoebe is there stroking Coma Guy's hair, when Monica enters with a
bunch of balloons.]

[Scene: Chandler and Joey's, Ross is talking to Chandler. Joey is making a snack at the
bar.]

[Scene: Central Perk, everyone is there except for Chandler.  Rachel is writing
something and Monica walks up.]

(She sees Monica sneaking out) Okay, thank you very much, I'm gonna take a
short break! (Runs out, knocking over the mike stand)
(Enter Chandler)
(People turn to look)

[Scene: The Coma Guy's Room, Monica bursts in, closely followed by Phoebe. There is no
sign of Coma Guy.  His bed is empty.]
